content: *you ll breeze through this boldly textured soft-touch homespun throw that crochets from start to finish in only 4-1/2 hours larger size takes 5-1/2 hours lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 825 skill level easy level 2 homespun® article #790 6 8 balls crochet hook - size q-19 **15 75 mm** gauge approximately 1 hdc2tog = 1 using 2 strands of yarn held together special stitch hdc2tog entire afghan is worked with 2 strands of yarn held together work in pattern until afghan is approx 43 55 without breaking yarn work crochet edging around all sides apply looped fringe at top and bottom edges if desired requires 8 wide piece of cardboard *because of the texture of homespun the fringe will fray when cut if you prefer a non-frayed look you can knot the ends knit or crochet a fringe or use hairspray or fray checktm by dritz® * also called fast finish throw
